Package application

Class DBUtils

java.lang.Object
application.DBUtils
public class DBUtils extends Object
Utility class which manages all the database connections

  • Method Details

    • getConnection

      public static Connection getConnection()
      Returns:
      connection returns the connection if is successfully connected to the database, else return null

    • changeScene

      public static void changeScene(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String fxmlFile, String title, String username, int moneyBalance, int unitsBought)
      Parameters:
      fxmlFile - fxmlFile is the parameter which requires the path of the fxml file to be open
      title - title is the text that will be displayed in the top left corner of the window
      username - username is the nick that actual user is using
      moneyBalance - moneyBalance is the parameter where users balance is stored
      unitsBought - unitsBought is the parameter containing the number of users units which were bought

    • signUpUser

      public static void signUpUser(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String username, String password, int moneyBalance, int unitsBought) throws ClassNotFoundException
      differs if the user exists and if not it registers him
      Parameters:
      username - username is the nick that actual user is using
      password - password is the login information need to sign up a new user
      moneyBalance - moneyBalance is the parameter where users balance is stored
      unitsBought - unitsBought is the parameter containing the number of users units which were bought
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException

    • logInUser

      public static void logInUser(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String username, String password)
      log in existing user
      Parameters:
      username - username is the nick that actual user is using
      password - string that stores the password

    • soldUnit

      public static void soldUnit(String unitType, int unitPrice, int unitValue, String soldTo, String items)
      soldUnit is the function that adds the sold unit to the database
      Parameters:
      unitType - unitType is the name of the current unit
      unitPrice - ending price of the current unit
      unitValue - starting value of the current unit
      soldTo - sold to is the last user who bid some money
      items - items contained inside the unit

    • updateActualUnit

      public static void updateActualUnit(String unitType, int unitPrice, String lastBid)
      it updates the database and sets the current unit as the unit which is currently used
      Parameters:
      unitType - unitType si the name of the actual unit
      unitPrice - is the actual price of the actual unit
      lastBid - it is the last user who bid some money

    • showStatistics

      public static void showStatistics(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String username)
      shows the statistics of the current user and displays them inside the statistics table
      Parameters:
      username - it is the name of the current user

    • getUnits

      public static ArrayList<CommonUnit> getUnits(String owner)
      returns the list of the sold units of the actual user
      Parameters:
      owner - it is the name of the current user
      Returns:
      returns a list of the sold units owned by current owner inside the database

    • updateUserInformation

      public static void updateUserInformation(String username, int moneyBalance, int unitsBought)
      updates the database such as money value and units bought of the actual user
      Parameters:
      username - name of the username
      moneyBalance - money balance of the current user
      unitsBought - number of units that user bought

    • resetTable

      public static void resetTable(String table)
      deletes the content of the given table
      Parameters:
      table - it is the name of the table which is going to be truncated

    • serialiseNewUser

      public static void serialiseNewUser(User user, String serialiseFilePath)
      serializes the user and saves all the information about the object to a .ser file
      Parameters:
      user - is the user which is going to be serialized
      serialiseFilePath - location where will be the serialization stored

    • deserialiseNewUser

      public static User deserialiseNewUser(String deserialiseFilePath) throws ClassNotFoundException
      deserializes the given file and creates a new user of it
      Parameters:
      deserialiseFilePath - is the location of the file that is going to be deserialized
      Returns:
      newUser that is a new user of the current auction. It can be received via Internet
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - exception that handles error if User class is not found
